More than 5 million participants worldwide report daily on newly discovered speedcams worldwide.âââââ Advantages of the PLUS version âââââ[â] Widget-Mode and Multi-Windows-Supports[â] Landscape mode, simply turn your smartphone 90Â°[â] Works in the background[â] New features will always be available in the PLUS version firstThis exclusive service is only available to users of the PLUS version. Ask us at support@camsam.comReview: http://goo.gl/8nFtCâââââ OVERVIEW OF FUNCTIONS âââââ- Real time alerts of mobile radar traps- More than 58.000 fixed speedcams worldwide from SCDB.info- Directional alerts for all fixed speedcams- Automatic updates every 5 minutes- Visual and acoustic warnings- Indication of device type and of legal speed limit- Simple alert function- Online/offline mode - Locations of fixed speedcams checked on site- Listening and radar view- Landscape mode- Background mode- Distance and direction of speedcam indicatedBUY  NOW AND TRAVEL MORE RELAXED! reviews.title: Keep Crashing
reviews.comment: Reset and cleared cache etc still bombs out usually after passing a camera
reviews.author: Tony Scott

reviews.title: Very good!
reviews.comment: Very good at what it does. The new widget is a lot better. I would love see a permanent widget on my home screen with the current road speed limit visible all the time.
reviews.author: Mark Collinge

reviews.title: DON\'T WASTE YOUR MONEY!!!
reviews.comment: Constant crashes. Support is awful. Argued with me about my phone (sgs3) being able to roam then ignored me. Poor English skills too. Absolute the worst app I\'ve bought. I\'m not a competitor.  Just a user using my REAL NAME.  Camsam now calling me a \"fake reviewer\".  That\'s bull.  They know who I am from my support emails to which they send one line, unhelpful responses.
reviews.author: Rob Kniaz

reviews.title: Camsam
reviews.comment: Very good
reviews.author: Guy Collinson

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Simple, intuitive and does exactly as described.
reviews.author: Harry Long

reviews.title: Very useful app
reviews.comment: I miss only two things: 1. If the device plays music while running this app too, then the app could pause the music while trying to notify the driver. When starting the music again, add volume gradually, similarly as Google Navigation. On a longer drive it\'s not healthy to keep the device screen always on, but with music playing the warnings might go unnoticed. 2. Europe-wide free data roaming. :D  You might be able to fix the first one, but if you fix the second too, I\'ll give you 6 stars! :D
reviews.author: Attila Magyar

reviews.title: Top app
reviews.comment: Very good app. Never drive without.
reviews.author: Jiri Zeman

reviews.title: Does not work
reviews.comment: Was 100 feet from police tripod radar on side of road no warning. Same thing approached hand held gun no warning. Waste of money!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Luv it
reviews.author: Carl Harris

reviews.title: John
reviews.comment: Very good app use it all the  time, keep up the good work.
reviews.author: John Tong

reviews.title: Unusable - Inutilizzabile
reviews.comment: Can\'t be used in background while using a navigator. Voice notifications aren\'t loud enough and worst of all, it doesn\'t detect sh!t.  I\'m asking for my money back right away.   ITALIANO: Col navigatore in funzione CamSam in background non serve a nulla. Intanto le notifiche vocali sono a volume bassissimo, e poi in una tratta dove so per sicuro che c\'e\' almeno un autovelox e un tutor operativi (e diversi altri che probabilmente non sono operativi), camSam non segnala una mazza. Distinstallata, e chiedero\' la restituzione del prezzo pagato
reviews.author: joeuser771

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Good
reviews.author: Boris Volansky

reviews.title: Sony xperia s ICS
reviews.comment: Please fix this!!! For a few monts I live in Dorset area (UK) and aplication works fine, but now I back to London, and can\'t use aplication, every time it crash, and this happen in london, if I go 50miles away then app working perfect.....

reviews.title: Top app
reviews.comment: 5 stars, would give it more if I could.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great Application!
reviews.comment: BETTER than RadarDroid, (which costs a lot more!)  Knows all Phila area red-light camera. Works in background with Google maps, and my favorite, CoPilot.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Total crap
reviews.comment: Don\'t buy this crap. Doesn\'t work except the developer is good at taking your money if you buy this crap. In the U. S., doesn\'t work at all.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Saving my bacon!
reviews.comment: Round trip from Cardiff UK to the south of France is a lot \"safer\" with this app.  A few false positives on the A10 but better safe than sorry..
